entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Rain showers beginning late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
